name: Duckman: Graphic Adventures of a Private Dick
name_original: Duckman: Graphic Adventures of a Private Dick
description:
Duckman: Graphic Adventures of a Private Dick is an adventure game developed by Illusions Gaming Company. It was originally released in 1997. Playmates Interactive Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Duckman: Graphic Adventures of a Private Dick is available on PC.
